full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID TSIGS SU BCAD PA KHYER BDE BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA GSAL BAR BYED PA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RAB 'BYAMS SMRA @011B BA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID DMIGS RIM DU DRIL BA ZHIG GYIS ZHES NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, LAM 'DI LA SHES NAS DAD PA THOB PA'I, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BGYI BAS, BLO BZANG MDUN SA DBEN SA CHOS KYI PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,) ` NA MO GU RU BHYA: SNANG BA MTHA' YAS DHARMA DHVA DZA YI, ,ZHAL GYI BUM BZANG LAS 'ONGS BDUD RTZI RGYUN, ,BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GSAL BAI SGRON ME 'DI, ,DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING DU PAR DU BRKOS, ,'DI YI DGE BAS MA RGAN 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,MI KHOM GNAS PA DAL 'BYOR RTEN THOB NAS, ,THUN MONG LAM GYI RIM PAS RGYUD SBYANGS TE, ,SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG DAM PA THOB PAR SHOG ,SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO BDE LEGS RDO RJE YI, ,CHAB SRID BRTAN ZHING MNGA' THANG RIGS BRGYUD 'PHEL, ,LEGS TSOGS THAMS CAD DBYAR MTSO'I DPAL BZHIN DU, ,GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI LUGS GNYIS LA MKHYEN DPYOD YANGS PA GUNG BDE LEGS RDO RJES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID TSIGS BCAD PA KHYER BDE BA 'DI NI, PAR BYANG @012A *, ,SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS TSUL LA BRTEN ^DZNY'A NA'I MING CAN GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DAD LDAN YE SHES SHES RABS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
